Title: Requires the payment of regular wages to bay constables employed by the town of Hempstead, Nassau county, who have sustained injuries or illnesses in the line of duty
Summary: Requires the payment of regular wages to bay constables employed by the town of Hempstead, Nassau county, who have sustained injuries or illnesses in the line of duty.
LawCode: Amd ยง207-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to providing coverage for injuries while in the line of duty by bay constables in the town of Hempstead, Nassau county
